text: Jean Boyer (26 June 1901 – 10 March 1965) was a French film director and songwriter. He was born in Paris. == Selected songs == * 1930: "Un regardé", in Flagrant délit (Hanns Schwarz, 1930, music by F. Hollaender) * 1931: "Les Gars de la marine", in Le Capitaine Craddock (music by W. R. Heyman) * 1932: "Totor t'as tort" (music by René Mercier) - "Un homme" - "L'amour est un mystère" - "Maintenant, je sais ce que c'est" - "Quand ça m'prend" (music by Michel Levine) * 1934: "C’est peu de chose" (music by R. Ervan) * 1936: "Y'a toujours un passage à niveau" (music by Georges Van Parys) * 1939: "Comme de bien entendu" - "Ça c'est passé un dimanche" - "Mimile" - "Ça fait d'excellents Français" (music by
